website_summaries.verdict: A cost-effective way to get the calming benefits of the brand's pheromone-based formula provided you only need it for infrequent and limited uses.
pros: Convenient method to get Feliway's benefits for one time or short-term use
Comes in a 12-count pack of individually wrapped wipes
Less costly than other Feliway methods
cons: Some users didn't find them as effective as the spray, but many satisfied customers like the easy application and calming effects the wipes produced

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats. 2 of them are 15 years old and the other 2 are younger. The older kitties were not adjusting to my recent move to a new home. One would hide under my bed covers all the time and the other was restless and whiny and kept me up all night. Finally at my wit’s end, I bought these wipes. I rubbed them on my furniture, the cats’ furniture and even put one under my pillow. One night! That’s all it took. My kitties are no longer afraid. I was amazed! I really recommend trying these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with Anxiety baby
customer_reviews.text: This truly works! My Babigirl (Nebelung feline) suffers from anxiety. After many years of issues, she is now on anxiety medication. She is frightened of anything and any sound. The poor thing. She foams at the mouth and even pees in her carrier when just going to the vet. I was concerned about flying across the U.S.A with her. Fortunately I ordered this and WHAT AN AMAZING PRODUCT. She never made a fuss. I AM IN SHOCK!! She was tended to all the time but I believe we were more nervous than her. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mlle Gia

customer_reviews.title: They turn a terror cat into a happy fuzz ball.
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat that loves me, but is deathly afraid of every other living thing, I swipe down the inside of his cage and put him in there for about 20 minutes and for over 4 hours he is willing to let humans pet him and will not attempt to kill the dog if he comes within 20 feet of him. He actually was cleaning the dogs ears. Its amazing. I can't smell anything on the wipe.
customer_reviews.author: jhawkins03585

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing for my nervous traveler, when they work.
customer_reviews.text: Has helped a great deal with my nervous kitty. She hates our monthly long road trips, but these pads have really heard to smooth her. However, so far, 4 of the packets, when opened, have been dry as the Sahara, so useless. when moist, they work well. but it looks like almost half my purchase was a dud. I open a dud and toss it, then try another and it works. no rhyme or reason. the packages don't look damages from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: glaslady

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a surprisingly calm trip.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 cats and anytime I have to take them to the vet they're not happy and they let me know it vocally the whole trip, and that is about a 1 hour trip each way. My wife and I just moved about 10 hours away so we were prepared to hear a symphony of meowing from start to finish, but before we left I wiped down their carriers as instructed and except for an occasional short meow they were surprisingly calm the whole trip and other than the Feliway wipes I didn't do anything different. Thank you Feliway wipes for keeping my cats calm and giving my wife and I a pleasant trip to our new home.
customer_reviews.author: E.J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: A Minor Miracle.
customer_reviews.text: My senior cats used to have high anxiety when traveling in the car for any distance, to the point where I would sometimes have to pull over and calm them down. Feliway in general has been a minor miracle, and the individual wipes are perfect to tuck into a purse or pet carrier so they never get accidentally left behind. Road trips are immeasurably easier now, my kitties are alert but calm and sometimes doze off. I can't thank the makers of Feliway enough!
customer_reviews.author: LISAIE

customer_reviews.title: They're great and happy kitty
customer_reviews.text: My cat was diagnosed with cancer and have to travel 2 hrs. to oncologist. This product truly made her ride calm and comfortable and kept meows to minimum.She has had surgery and used this product on Pen she stays in and blankets, and has helped her accept new digs wonderfully while healing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Tyrrell

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work :(
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these specifically to help with my cat’s hatred of car rides, but I guess I’ll keep looking for other options. Didn’t work for either of my cats (one in a hard carrier and one in a soft carrier). Now that I have them anyway, I’ll keep using them and see if it makes a difference in the future (didn’t make it worse!) and I’ll update my review if something changes. But this seems to have been a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my kitty!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a horrible traveler. I got these wipes so that she may have a better time handling an hour long car ride. I followed the instructions on the package, but I am sorry to report that it did not help with my kitty's nerves on the car trips. I even used two wipes to wipe down the inside of her carriage the second time, but unfortunately the results were no better. I am not saying that these wipes don't work, just that they did not work for my cat. I am not too disappointed as these wipes were not very expensive, but it is unfortunate that they did not soothe my kitty's travel anxiety in the slightest.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: If it was water, I believe it would have worked better. In fact, on the way to the Vet, my kitten tried to chew and claw through the bars of her carrier--while growling. A 2 and 1/2 pound Siamese kitten acting like a mobster braking out of Alcatraz!! So, I'll have to say it's a bust! G
customer_reviews.author: Gerry B. Anzalone

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$ My cat is still fat, and dirty.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this, as a Vet told us SOME people, had success using it for their cats, when traveling. We are NOT traveling, we were just trying to get our FAT ginger cat, to calm the **** down, so we could clean his fat ***! Did NOT effect him one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Invisiable Value

customer_reviews.title: Good product- Cat Specific!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this PER ITS INSTRUCTIONS. Cat Specific synthetic hormone (pheromones) . Some products are not specifically for cats. This is. I wipe a little on cat carrier per directions. Let it dry. Helps for vet visit!!! I also use it on bathroom areas where I corral my cat for his daily pill. I wipe it around (& on protective towel wrap) LET IT DRY- and within the 4 hour window, take him in there & let him sniff it and relax for 5 mins... HELPS to make pill giving a little less of an anxious & traumatic experience.
customer_reviews.author: kario

customer_reviews.title: Feliway wipes are an ear-saver!
customer_reviews.text: This product really worksI I wipe the carrier and the bottom of the carrier pad with the Feliway wipe (not the top of the pad), and let dry for 10 minutes. On the 20 minute trip to the vet, I hear a few initial meows, and then ....... silence. Previously, I would be serenaded by an increasing volume of cries and meows for the entire trip. This product is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: bxmye

customer_reviews.title: Scared the Cat
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get the cat used to the cat carrier, and also trying to get her to stay inside more, she would have nothing to do with this and even stopped coming inside after getting a whiff of it. She was a feral-house cat coming inside to sleep with me at night, and I am going to be moving and need her to relax more so I can relocate her with me. This did not work but maybe I will have more luck with the spray. This was a waste of money and worked in reverse.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L

customer_reviews.title: Can't tell if it's effective.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a cross country trip with my cats, wiping each of their carriers down in the mornings before hitting the road. I honestly can't say how much effect it had, as my boy stayed calm the whole way but my girl absolutely freaked out on the second day and we had to make arrangements outside of the carrier to keep her calm and safe. On a prior trip a vet had given me a light sedative for the cats and I think that worked much better, if I ever move that far again, I will skip these and go with the sedative.
customer_reviews.author: Goldfish

customer_reviews.title: Helps some cats, but not all.
customer_reviews.text: In introducing a new cat into my home I upset the balance of power for the resident cats! To restore harmony my vet. recommended I use Feliway diffusers plug-ins which I did. There was the need for additional help in certain spots, so, I thought that I'd try the wipes. They have been helpful, but do not help some cats.... some are receptive and some are not. Even so, they are worth using!!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Ferley

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this item for your kitty.
customer_reviews.text: These work great for our cat. She won't stay away from her carrier. She is a very nervous kitty and seemed to do great with this rubbed around the outside of the carrier. At one point at home she even went into her carrier all on her own. That is a life saver. She normally hates her carrier.
customer_reviews.author: terry gilliland

customer_reviews.title: Wipes worked for our kittens.
customer_reviews.text: The wipes worked great. One of our 2 kittens hates being in the carrier and in the car, I used 1 wipe and wiped the entire inside of the carrier, put the kittens inside and then into the car. Where she previously screamed and cried all the way to the vet (10 minutes away) after using the wipe, she was calmer and relaxed. It worked for us and the 1 wipe was plenty as it stayed damp as I wiped the carrier down.
customer_reviews.author: Bandmom

customer_reviews.title: not helpful
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is a good boy but he gets stressed and upset during car rides. We are trying to prepare him for a long car ride for when we move. This stuff was no help at all. We also tried a gabapetin prescription from the vet and that didn’t help either. Maybe our car is the problem and not this feliway. side note- we have and will continue to take our cat for practice car rides. I hope he gets accustomed to then. *sigh
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: They really work for road trips/moving.
customer_reviews.text: We moved states with our furbabies. One of our cats was car sick, drooling really bad. I placed a wipe above each kennel and some used ones near her bedding. It seemed to helped as when I checked on her, she had stopped. All of our cats were meowing but once I pulled the wipes out, them seemed to calm down immediately. I also cranked the A/C to keep the car cool and comfortable for them. The rest of the 9 hrs they were calm and sleeping. I heard a peep or two but they were fine nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia E.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my cat but it worked fro my friend’s
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my very nervous cat who had to go to the vet. He absolutely hated the smell of these wipes, so much so that he ran away the moment I used them on his carrier and kept running away from me until I washed my hands :( I still gave it 3 stars because I know it worked for the nervous cat of mine, so I suppose it depends on the cat...
customer_reviews.author: Yoanna

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product for short trips
customer_reviews.text: Took elderly cat to vet and she cried all the way. Vet wiped inside of cat carrier with Feliway wipe, waited 10 minutes and cat(and humans) had a peaceful ride home from vet. I would recommend this product for short trips. Don't know how it works for long trips.
customer_reviews.author: M. E. Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great anti-anxiety scent for cat's carrier
customer_reviews.text: I always use one of these Feliway wipes on my cat's carrier before going to the vet or going on a trip. After rubbing the wipe all over the inside of the carrier, I put the wipe under the "floor" of his carrier to keep the scent going. I find that this helps reduce his anxiety somewhat.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Musselman

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness
customer_reviews.text: I was not sure if these wipes would work, but I have to say, I used them in my cat carrier for my "devil girl" when I took her to the vet for her checkup. It was a big relief to me, and needless to say for my Vet, when Julia the cat was not hissing, spitting and growling when she went into the exam room. Whew, happy day !!
customer_reviews.author: Denise  S.

customer_reviews.title: kept him nice and calm
customer_reviews.text: Used these for a 5 hour flight with my cat, kept him nice and calm, he slept the whole way.
customer_reviews.author: ruby 1987

customer_reviews.title: Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I recently postponed a trip of ours until these arrived. We travel about 7 hours one way, two times a year and we didn’t realize we were out until the day before we were going to leave. Thank the Lord, our cat has remained pretty calm throughout all of our trips! We do reapply about half way through the trip but it is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Co

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works fantastically....drove all the way from Florida with 2 overnights to Connecticut. Cats were calm.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: It worked really well on getting my neurotic cat to the vet without all of his symptoms in traveling. Calmed him down. Anyone with a nervous "Nellie" cat should try this.
customer_reviews.author: paula skube

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: These wipes helped us survive an 1800 mile, 4 day relocation drive with my 20 pound diva cat who had always HATED the car! We would wipe the sides of the carrier every few hours as instructed and then I would place the used wipe under the pad in her carrier. I have to admit that I was a bit skeptical, but am so happy that I purchased these and now would highly recommend. We have leftover wipes which I am saving for a future vet trip etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kim C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't really do anything
customer_reviews.text: Tested on and off for a few days and didn't see a difference in either of my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cat!
customer_reviews.text: Our vet has become a stress free clinic and one of these was in our pre-appointment packet. Absolutely amazing how calm it made our cat who generally cries when he is taken out of the house in his carrier. Your cat will be a very happy cat if you try them.
customer_reviews.author: Buystoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Significantly reduces your pet's stress
customer_reviews.text: Our veterinarian recommended this. One of our cats is terrified of being put in the cat carrier. Wiping the carrier with one of the Feliway wipes calms him down so he is considerably less stressed when he has to go to his vet appointment.
customer_reviews.author: stormy

customer_reviews.title: excellent for diffusing agression in a multi-cat household
customer_reviews.text: When only one cat goes to the vet, he picks up the odor of the cat hospital. Right before I leave, I wipe the cat down so his brother at home does not react to the strange odor. The cats recognize each other by scent rather than by appearance. Cats are territorial; they react badly when they smell a strange cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Makes travel with kitty pleasant
customer_reviews.text: This product solved my problem. It first was recommended by my vet. My cat's anxiety when traveling by car is now gone. He would cry, be agitated and made the ride no fun for either of us. When I wiped the inside of his carrier with the Feliway and then placed the wipe under a towel in the bottom of the carrier so it wouldn't touch him, he relaxed. Once he is comfortable and peaceful-so am I. Plan to use one now anytime we travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie

customer_reviews.title: there products are good
customer_reviews.text: there products are good but i thought this was something i could rub on the kitties. i don't see that on the instructions. i will use a few times around their throws and see what takes place. thanks
customer_reviews.author: cayC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat has high anxiety - especially during tornado season he's having to spend a little more time that he'd like in the carrier. A quick wipe with one of these and he's doing a little better. We also love the Feliway plug-ins!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne H.

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing yhey are no longer unhappy travelers
customer_reviews.text: If your cats get car sick, muelling and being very unhappy,try these. Wipe the entire inside of the carrier including roof and floor. If you use a blanket or towel in the bottom still do the botttom and then wipe on the top of the towel or blanket. I then hang the towellete thru the slot by the handle so it hangs into the carrier. It's amazing yhey are no longer unhappy travelers.
customer_reviews.author: Dmk

customer_reviews.title: Our cat can now travel at least 4 hours on the road!
customer_reviews.text: This product actually worked for our cat. He is an elderly cat and has trouble with digestion. The vet did not want to give him drugs to put him to sleep while traveling because it would affect his bowl movements. This calms him down and he actually enjoys traveling with us once again!
customer_reviews.author: DAW53

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: These wipes really help to ease anxiety. I use the spray as well, which is also fabulous. My cat doesn't have problems with spraying or scratching, it's separation anxiety and these really help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure this works. But it smells good. I had 3 cats rescued a new one. Thought this might help. Not sure it did anything but make them smell clean
customer_reviews.author: Monica Asaro

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product on the inside of my cat's pet carrier when I had to take her to the vet. She did appear to be more relaxed when we were in the car. She normally cries, but this time she didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Good for an emergency
customer_reviews.text: The tissues worked well for the promised 4 or so hours, but if I rubbed surrounding areas after my cat settled, he would leave. A bit expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Kramer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work. I can't really test this under lab conditions to see if it works in 100% of all cases, but it seems to do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic's mind blown at effects
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely blown away by this product going into this with heavy dose of skepticism. I tested it on my clean laundry hamper full of clothes which my cat 100% of the time goes insane with, jumping in, knocking over and generally obsessed with...she keeps smelling it calmly and walking away disinterested. This is is not a fluke as I've tried it multiple times over the course of a week, it's an obvious 180 degree change in behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Vaioooo

customer_reviews.title: Good for use in a small cat carrier.
customer_reviews.text: It appears to work. My cat likes to travel, but not as much in a small carry on airplane carrier. The wipes might have helped keep her calm on the long trip home on the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsure if it did anything....
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we're a tad unsure if it helped our kitty calm down - maybe the scent doesn't work on her. She was still pretty vocal in the carrier/car for a while too :/ maybe works with others, but on ours, nope
customer_reviews.author: nachocorgidog

customer_reviews.title: I've only used this product twice on two different cats ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this product twice on two different cats. It seemed to calm them for their hour+ drive to our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Maverick

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: No drowsiness (unfortunately), no nausea (thankfully) and no comfort (disappointingly). Whatever it is (pheromones?), my cat is immune.
customer_reviews.author: Guru

customer_reviews.title: They work great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a super anxious cat that was terrified of his crate, and it was almost impossible to get him in it. Bought these wipes as recommended by the vet and he goes right in now!
customer_reviews.author: JDPP21

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t seem to work for my cat
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended calming wipes but personally it does not seem to help my cat. If anything the scent is foreign and strange to her so she seems to distance herself from where i wiped it
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Cats disliked it!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the product at all. Everything I rubbed this on, both cats would not go near until I washed it off. It was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L

customer_reviews.title: These were highly recommended by my Vet for our cat that absolutely despises ...
customer_reviews.text: These were highly recommended by my Vet for our cat that absolutely despises his carrier. After using the Feliway wipe the cat still wasn't happy about going into the carrier but he was much more calm and barely cried at all once he was inside it. I'll keep using these!
customer_reviews.author: Binks

customer_reviews.title: Surprise effect.
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 11 week old kitten pair during airplane travel. Calm, slept. 1 wipe was enough. wiped the inside of carrier and placed wipe under padding.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like.
customer_reviews.text: I think the plug-ins work better. I swear by them. The wet wipes weren't affective
customer_reviews.author: Travis & Claire T

customer_reviews.title: Flammable.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff has flammable warnings all over it. Definitely not applying it anywhere near my pets or my home.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Helps my nervous cat
customer_reviews.text: These help my nervous cat settle into her cat carrier. As well as rubbing down the plastic carrier with the wipes, I leave the wipe tucked in with the carrier's blanket for a few minutes before putting her in. She is visibly less distressed and more comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: EHK

customer_reviews.title: It really works on our stressed cat
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat that gets totally stressed when going to the vet. I completely wiped down the car carrier and bedding inside before putting the cat in and he was very relaxed for our vet visit. I am a fan of the wipes and will buy more. I also am a fan of the Feliway plug ins.
customer_reviews.author: ddp

customer_reviews.title: Worked, I guess.
customer_reviews.text: Tough to say if these really worked but cats were calm on the trip. One of our cats is easy going. The other was a bit agitated but she’s 19.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Barely damp
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've purchased Feliway Wipes. The wipes were barely damp, almost dry. I don't know if that's the way they are suppose to be but there wasn't much product on the wipe at all.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t notice any change when used with my cats. Wouldn’t purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: lr

customer_reviews.title: Best calming solution for travel crates. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these because my cats are strictly indoor and have high stress levels when traveling. This product I first received from my local vet as a sample to help calm them before vet visits. And I fell in love with these wipes. They work amazing for both of my cats. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Hart

customer_reviews.title: Product has a great reputation.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have to use it. Donated to a cat shelter and they were very happy to receive it.
customer_reviews.author: DRS

customer_reviews.title: Our old-man cat hates the vet. We've tried nearly ...
customer_reviews.text: Our old-man cat hates the vet. We've tried nearly everything to get him to calm down when we have to take him in. I'm really not convinced that wiping out the cat carrier with these did anything at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great. When I take my cat to the vet
customer_reviews.text: This is great. When I take my cat to the vet, I wipe it on his cage and it really relaxes him. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Engber

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These are great for using in the pet carrier when traveling with our cat. Calms her down. Glad to find them here at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: TWiggs

customer_reviews.title: Or maybe the wipes are just useless. I can't really tell
customer_reviews.text: Didn't phase my cat for her trip to the vet but she's also a feral cat so that might factor in. Or maybe the wipes are just useless. I can't really tell.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! My cat was terrified of her carrier until using these wipes. I mean, it was impossible to get her into the crate... since using these, my cat has learned to love her crate. I always wipe down the front door, edges, and inside of the crate, and she just crawls right in, gets cozy, and relaxes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for us.
customer_reviews.text: I honestly couldn’t tell a difference. It just may not work for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Smith

customer_reviews.title: Returned!
customer_reviews.text: This product caused a bad allergy type reaction in the cats and humans. We used as directed but needed to discontinue use and returned. Alarmed and disappointed as they say this product is safe to use.
customer_reviews.author: T Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.text: These worked very well when I moved my cats on a 4-hour trip. Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Mc

customer_reviews.title: I am glad I tried these
customer_reviews.text: I believe they helped my little "nervous" cat." She's afraid of everything!! However, she does seem to be coming around and will even let me reach out and pet her when I want to now. I am glad I tried these. (On the down side, they were barely damp when I took them out of the foil.)
customer_reviews.author: correne marshall

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Makes it much more easy and pleasant to transport my cat to the vet...She really calmed down!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Seem to Make a Difference
customer_reviews.text: I've used this when moving and when putting my cats on flights. If it makes a difference, I can't tell.
customer_reviews.author: Baylea Sorto

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: We wiped down the cat carrier before a large move to keep stress levels down for the 2 cats. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: AmberM

customer_reviews.title: Finally quiet car rides to the vet...
customer_reviews.text: I use it to wipe the carrier before going to the vet, worked for both my old cat and my kitten... definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Really mellowed our cat herd
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good things about this product. Saved our household of 5 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Moser

customer_reviews.title: I think it worked!
customer_reviews.text: My bengal travels poorly but I think this stuff made a notable difference after the gabapentin softened but did not silence her screams from her travel sherpa.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleChavez

customer_reviews.title: Unable to apply to cat
customer_reviews.text: This has to be applied to a surface by rubbing it on. It can't be applied to the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: A must have when traveling with a cat. A wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Steen

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't For Me
customer_reviews.text: My fault, I thought these wipes could go right on the cat. Since my cat sleeps many different places, these didn't work for me. As soon as I wiped one area, she never went back. I will keep them for vet trips, but that's not really what I needed them for so this is the best review I can give.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia G.

customer_reviews.title: Work pretty good but I’m getting the spray next time
customer_reviews.text: Been going through some stuff so my cats been in his carrier a lot lately. Seems to help
customer_reviews.author: Donna Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: The wipes didnt work for my cat. Was a strong odor too
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful in introducing a new cat into the house
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective for both cats
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all and now I'm out of the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: i think its good,? my cats are just high strung cats
customer_reviews.text: i think its good, ? my cats are just high strung cats. so its hard to verify
customer_reviews.author: P R Travis

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel like my cat reacted in any way to these.
customer_reviews.author: BellaGrace

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: Great for creating a calming carrier during vet visits. I use the spray a lot but these wipes can be used on hard surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: DGA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really helps to calm my cat when bringing him to the vet.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a waste of money, not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Calm Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and effective. Great help in getting a stubborn kitty into carrier for trip to vet.
customer_reviews.author: Cece

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my cat.
customer_reviews.text: Started using this these for my cat it when I took her to the vet. She gets very nervous in her kennel and these really take a nervousness down a lot. She's doesn't know anymore in her kennel she seems quite relaxed. I think you're very effective.
customer_reviews.author: edithfriendly

customer_reviews.title: Had an opposite effect on my cat
customer_reviews.text: Wiped the carrier and the cat went ballistic. He was calmer in his carrier before the wipes. Money wasted and cat still needs something to calm him down in the carrier.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: Really helps calm my nervous cats
customer_reviews.text: Sampled these at the vet's office many months ago. They've been nearly impossible to find for sale. Finally got a box and used them with my newest kitten. They really helped calm her down while traveling to/from the vet.
customer_reviews.author: LeendaDLL

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Did not seem to help much, but didn't hurt either.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: I use the wipes on the cat carrier when returning ...
customer_reviews.text: I use the wipes on the cat carrier when returning foster kitties to the humane society. It seems to help calm them and makes the trip back much calmer for all of us!!
customer_reviews.author: Lorith

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: didn't do anything to calm my cat on the plane. We've flown several times together and there wasn't a difference in her behavior when I used the product :/
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: I like it but one of my cats is resistant to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like it but one of my cats is resistant to it. I was very impressed when my VET told my that they too use the spray.....
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Fardhosseini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great to wipe down the carrier before car trips and vet visits.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Henry

customer_reviews.title: worked fairly well. Had to fly with two cats ...
customer_reviews.text: worked fairly well. Had to fly with two cats who were scared of the carriers and flying in general. This took the edge off.
customer_reviews.author: Seekonk MA pet lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn't use anything else for my cats, when I take them to the vet ! Great product !!
customer_reviews.author: Crescentia Turner

product_meta.title: Feliway Animal Health C95660B 12 Count Feliway Wipes, All Sizes,Purple
product_meta.description: Feliway wipes offer a natural and convenient way to provide Spot solution to help and comfort your cat by getting them to like their carrier and find it a place of comfort, providing comfort on their bedding area, increasing your ability to travel more with your cat, and making it easier to transport your cat to the veterinarian for health checks. Once you have tried feliway wipes and experience the efficacy they deliver for short term behavior needs we recommend USAGE of the feliway diffuser for longer term issues like spraying, scratching, tension in multi-cat households and environmental disruptions to cat’s routine like moving and renovation.
feature_bullets: For those short term behavior needs
Increases your ability to travel more easily with your cat
Provides comfort on their bedding area
Helps to get your cat to like their carrier and find it as a place of comfort
Age Range Description: All Life Stages
